item.title: Learning Kubernetes Part 1
item.description: Hi!, In this post I will start a series about my process learning Kubernetes. This is not meant to be a series of tutorials but rather a diary about me exploring some of the concepts and tools used for leveraging the use of container orchestration solutions as k8s for the. So lets start … First, the concepts One of the things that I like to do before deep dive in any piece of technology, is GET THE CONCEPTS RIGHT and by that I mean learn the fundamentals basics that distinguish this tool you are learning from others that you already use.
